channel.title: CVE Feed for Innominate -- Innominate mGuard rs4000 4TX/TX
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Innominate -- Innominate mGuard rs4000 4TX/TX

item.title: CVE-2020-12523|2024-08-04T11:56:52.083Z -- innominate -- innominate%20mguard%20rs4000%204tx%2Ftx
item.description: On Phoenix Contact mGuard Devices versions before 8.8.3 LAN ports get functional after reboot even if they are disabled in the device configuration. For mGuard devices with integrated switch on the LAN side, single switch ports can be disabled by device configuration. After a reboot these ports get functional independent from their configuration setting: Missing Initialization of Resource
